RefParameter.Name: USBD_MAX_STR_DESC_SIZ
RefParameter.Comment: USBD_MAX_STR_DESC_SIZ (Maximum size for the string descriptors)

RefParameter.Name: USBD_DEBUG_LEVEL

PossibleValue.Comment: 3: All messages and internal debug messages are shown

RefParameter.Description:
Define different level output trace as folowing :
0 : No debug message is shown
1 : only User message are shown
2 : User + Error messages are shown
3 : All message and interal debug message are shown

Active only when USB_OTG_FS IP is configured in Device mode
